description:
Palmer's Cocoa Butter Formula Body Lotion is a rich, luxurious, daily body lotion which softens and smoothes rough, dry skin, and provides deep hydration all over. Now with 48 hour moisture.

Crafted with intensively moisturising Cocoa Butter and Vitamin E. Cocoa Butter is naturally harvested from cocoa beans, and is a rich, nutrient-packed super ingredient loaded with antioxidant CMPs (Cocoa Mass Polyphenols) for superior skin healing and moisture barrier protection.

Product Features:

  • With Cocoa Butter and Vitamin E
  • Smoothes marks & tones skin
  • Now with 48 hour moisture
  • Paraben and Phthalate free
  • Dermatologist Recommended
  • Suitable for eczema prone skin
name: Palmer's 591ML
